SELECT [i].[Id], [i].[CourseFee], [i].[EndDate], [i].[Name], [i].[StartDate], [i].[Subject], [i].[TeacherId], [t].[Id], [t].[ApplicationUserId], [t].[Birthday], [t].[CodeMelly], [t].[FullName], [t].[Gender], [t].[PhoneNumber], [t].[Salary], [t].[Subject]
FROM (

    SELECT 
        C.Id,
        C.TeacherId,
        C.Name,
        C.StartDate,
        C.EndDate,
        C.Subject,
        C.CourseFee,
        T.Id AS Teacher_Id,
        T.ApplicationUserId,
        T.Salary,
        T.Subject AS TeacherSubject,
        T.FullName,
        T.Birthday,
        T.CodeMelly,
        T.PhoneNumber,
        T.Gender
    FROM Courses AS C
    INNER JOIN Teachers AS T ON C.TeacherId = Teacher_Id
) AS [i]

SELECT [i].[Id], [i].[CourseFee], [i].[EndDate], [i].[Name], [i].[StartDate], [i].[Subject], [i].[TeacherId], [t].[Id], [t].[ApplicationUserId], [t].[Birthday], [t].[CodeMelly], [t].[FullName], [t].[Gender], [t].[PhoneNumber], [t].[Salary], [t].[Subject]
FROM (

                    SELECT 
                        C.Id,
                        C.TeacherId,
                        C.Name,
                        C.StartDate,
                        C.EndDate,
                        C.Subject,
                        C.CourseFee,
                        T.Id AS Teacher_Id,
                        T.ApplicationUserId,
                        T.Salary,
                        T.Subject AS TeacherSubject,
                        T.FullName,
                        T.Birthday,
                        T.CodeMelly,
                        T.PhoneNumber,
                        T.Gender
                    FROM Courses AS C
                    INNER JOIN Teachers AS T ON C.TeacherId = Teacher_Id
) AS [i]
INNER JOIN [Teachers] AS [t] ON [i].[TeacherId] = [t].[Id]

SELECT [i].[Id], [i].[CourseFee], [i].[EndDate], [i].[Name], [i].[StartDate], [i].[Subject], [i].[TeacherId], [t].[Id], [t].[ApplicationUserId], [t].[Birthday], [t].[CodeMelly], [t].[FullName], [t].[Gender], [t].[PhoneNumber], [t].[Salary], [t].[Subject]
FROM (

                    SELECT 
                        C.Id,
                        C.TeacherId,
                        C.Name,
                        C.StartDate,
                        C.EndDate,
                        C.Subject,
                        C.CourseFee,
                        T.Id AS Teacher_Id,
                        T.ApplicationUserId,
                        T.Salary,
                        T.Subject AS TeacherSubject,
                        T.FullName,
                        T.Birthday,
                        T.CodeMelly,
                        T.PhoneNumber,
                        T.Gender
                    FROM Courses AS C
                    INNER JOIN Teachers AS T ON C.TeacherId = TeacherId
) AS [i]
INNER JOIN [Teachers] AS [t] ON [i].[TeacherId] = [t].[Id]

SELECT [i].[Id], [i].[CourseFee], [i].[EndDate], [i].[Name], [i].[StartDate], [i].[Subject], [i].[TeacherId], [t].[Id], [t].[ApplicationUserId], [t].[Birthday], [t].[CodeMelly], [t].[FullName], [t].[Gender], [t].[PhoneNumber], [t].[Salary], [t].[Subject]

                    SELECT 
                        C.Id,
                        C.TeacherId,
                        C.Name,
                        C.StartDate,
                        C.EndDate,
                        C.Subject,
                        C.CourseFee,
                        T.Id AS Teacher_Id,
                        T.ApplicationUserId,
                        T.Salary,
                        T.Subject AS TeacherSubject,
                        T.FullName,
                        T.Birthday,
                        T.CodeMelly,
                        T.PhoneNumber,
                        T.Gender
                    FROM Courses AS C

) AS [i]

        C.Id,
        C.TeacherId,
        C.Name,
        C.StartDate,
        C.EndDate,
        C.Subject,
        C.CourseFee,
        T.Id AS Teacher_Id,

                        C.Id,

SELECT [i].[Id], [i].[CourseFee], [i].[EndDate], [i].[Name], [i].[StartDate], [i].[Subject], [i].[TeacherId], [t].[Id], [t].[ApplicationUserId], [t].[Birthday], [t].[CodeMelly], [t].[FullName], [t].[Gender], [t].[PhoneNumber], [t].[Salary], [t].[Subject]
FROM (
    SELECT 
        C.Id AS Course_Id,
        C.TeacherId,
        C.Name,
        C.StartDate,
        C.EndDate,
        C.Subject AS Course_Subject,
        C.CourseFee,
        T.Id AS Teacher_Id,
        T.ApplicationUserId,
        T.Salary,
        T.Subject AS Teacher_Subject,
        T.FullName,
        T.Birthday,
        T.CodeMelly,
        T.PhoneNumber,
        T.Gender
    FROM Courses AS C
    INNER JOIN Teachers AS T ON C.TeacherId = T.Id
) AS [i]
INNER JOIN [Teachers] AS [t] ON [i].[TeacherId] = [t].[Id]

SELECT 
    C.Id AS Course_Id,
    C.TeacherId,
    C.Name,
    C.StartDate,
    C.EndDate,
    C.Subject AS Course_Subject,
    C.CourseFee,
    T.Id AS Teacher_Id,
    T.ApplicationUserId,
    T.Salary,
    T.Subject AS Teacher_Subject,

    T.PhoneNumber,
    T.Gender
FROM Courses AS C

SELECT [i].[Id], [i].[CourseFee], [i].[EndDate], [i].[Name], [i].[StartDate], [i].[Subject], [i].[TeacherId], [t].[Id], [t].[ApplicationUserId], [t].[Birthday], [t].[CodeMelly], [t].[FullName], [t].[Gender], [t].[PhoneNumber], [t].[Salary], [t].[Subject]
FROM (
    SELECT 
        C.Id,
        C.TeacherId,
        C.Name,
        C.StartDate,
        C.EndDate,
        C.Subject,
        C.CourseFee,
        T.Id AS Teacher_Id,
        T.ApplicationUserId,
        T.Salary,
        T.Subject AS Teacher_Subject,
        T.FullName,
        T.Birthday,
        T.CodeMelly,
        T.PhoneNumber,
        T.Gender
    FROM Courses AS C
    INNER JOIN Teachers AS T ON C.TeacherId = T.Id
) AS [i]
INNER JOIN [Teachers] AS [t] ON [i].[TeacherId] = [t].[Id]

SELECT [i].[Id], [i].[CourseFee], [i].[EndDate], [i].[Name], [i].[StartDate], [i].[Subject], [i].[TeacherId], [t].[Id], [t].[ApplicationUserId], [t].[Birthday], [t].[CodeMelly], [t].[FullName], [t].[Gender], [t].[PhoneNumber], [t].[Salary], [t].[Subject]

                    SELECT 
                        C.Id,
                        C.TeacherId,
                        C.Name,
                        C.StartDate,
                        C.EndDate,
                        C.Subject,
                        C.CourseFee,
                        T.Id AS Teacher_Id,
                        T.ApplicationUserId,
                        T.Salary,
                        T.Subject AS Teacher_Subject,
                        T.FullName,
                        T.Birthday,
                        T.CodeMelly,
                        T.PhoneNumber,
                        T.Gender
                    FROM Courses AS C
                    INNER JOIN Teachers AS T ON C.TeacherId = T.Id
                    WHERE C.TeacherId = @p0
) AS [i]

SELECT [i].[CourseFee], [i].[EndDate], [i].[Id], [i].[Name], [i].[StartDate], [t].[Id], [s].[StudentId], [s].[CourseId], [s].[Score], [i].[Subject], [t].[ApplicationUserId], [t].[Birthday], [t].[CodeMelly], [t].[FullName], [t].[Gender], [t].[PhoneNumber], [t].[Salary], [t].[Subject], [i].[TeacherId]
FROM (

        SELECT 
            C.Id,
            C.TeacherId,
            C.Name,
            C.StartDate,
            C.EndDate,
            C.Subject,
            C.CourseFee,
            T.Id AS Teacher_Id,
            T.ApplicationUserId,
            T.Salary,
            T.Subject AS TeacherSubject,
            T.FullName,
            T.Birthday,
            T.CodeMelly,
            T.PhoneNumber,
            T.Gender
        FROM Courses AS C
        INNER JOIN Teachers AS T ON C.TeacherId = T.Id
) AS [i]
INNER JOIN [Teachers] AS [t] ON [i].[TeacherId] = [t].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [StudentCourses] AS [s] ON [i].[Id] = [s].[CourseId]
ORDER BY [i].[Id], [t].[Id], [s].[StudentId]

SELECT [i].[CourseFee], [i].[EndDate], [i].[Id], [i].[Name], [i].[StartDate], [t].[Id], [s].[StudentId], [s].[CourseId], [s].[Score], [i].[Subject], [t].[ApplicationUserId], [t].[Birthday], [t].[CodeMelly], [t].[FullName], [t].[Gender], [t].[PhoneNumber], [t].[Salary], [t].[Subject], [i].[TeacherId]
FROM (

                        SELECT C.* , 
                        T.Id as Teacher_Id,
                        T.*
                        From Courses AS C 
                        INNER JOIN Teachers AS T ON C.TeacherId = T.Id
) AS [i]
INNER JOIN [Teachers] AS [t] ON [i].[TeacherId] = [t].[Id]

SELECT [i].[CourseFee], [i].[EndDate], [i].[Id], [i].[Name], [i].[StartDate], [t].[Id], [s].[StudentId], [s].[CourseId], [s].[Score], [i].[Subject], [t].[ApplicationUserId], [t].[Birthday], [t].[CodeMelly], [t].[FullName], [t].[Gender], [t].[PhoneNumber], [t].[Salary], [t].[Subject], [i].[TeacherId]
FROM (

                        SELECT C.* , 
                        T.Id as Teacher_Id,
                        From Courses AS C 
                        INNER JOIN Teachers AS T ON C.TeacherId = T.Id
) AS [i]
INNER JOIN [Teachers] AS [t] ON [i].[TeacherId] = [t].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [StudentCourses] AS [s] ON [i].[Id] = [s].[CourseId]
ORDER BY [i].[Id], [t].[Id], [s].[StudentId]

SELECT [c].[Id], [c].[CourseFee], [c].[EndDate], [c].[Name], [c].[StartDate], [c].[Subject], [c].[TeacherId], [i].[CourseId], [i].[Score], [s].[Id], [s].[ApplicationUserId], [s].[Birthday], [s].[CodeMelly], [s].[FullName], [s].[Gender], [s].[Grade], [s].[PhoneNumber], [i].[StudentId]
FROM (
    SELECT SC.*,
                             S.Id AS Student_Id,
                             S.*,
                             C.Id AS Course_Id,
                             C.*,
                             T.Id AS Teacher_Id,
                             T.*
                             FROM StudentCourses AS SC
                             INNER JOIN Courses AS C ON SC.CourseId = C.Id
                             INNER JOIN Teachers AS T ON C.TeacherId = T.Id
                             INNER JOIN Students AS S ON SC.StudentId = S.Id
) AS [i]
INNER JOIN [Courses] AS [c] ON [i].[CourseId] = [c].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Students] AS [s] ON [i].[StudentId] = [s].[Id]

SELECT [c].[Id], [c].[CourseFee], [c].[EndDate], [c].[Name], [c].[StartDate], [c].[Subject], [c].[TeacherId], [i].[CourseId], [i].[Score], [s].[Id], [s].[ApplicationUserId], [s].[Birthday], [s].[CodeMelly], [s].[FullName], [s].[Gender], [s].[Grade], [s].[PhoneNumber], [i].[StudentId]
FROM (
    SELECT SC.*,
                             S.Id AS Student_Id,
                             S.*,
                            
                             C.*,
                             T.Id AS Teacher_Id,
                             T.*
                             FROM StudentCourses AS SC
                             INNER JOIN Courses AS C ON SC.CourseId = C.Id
                             INNER JOIN Teachers AS T ON C.TeacherId = T.Id
                             INNER JOIN Students AS S ON SC.StudentId = S.Id
) AS [i]

SELECT [c].[Id], [c].[CourseFee], [c].[EndDate], [c].[Name], [c].[StartDate], [c].[Subject], [c].[TeacherId], [i].[CourseId], [i].[Score], [s].[Id], [s].[ApplicationUserId], [s].[Birthday], [s].[CodeMelly], [s].[FullName], [s].[Gender], [s].[Grade], [s].[PhoneNumber], [i].[StudentId]

2025-04-10 18:19:48.425 +04:30 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (124ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [c].[Id], [c].[CourseFee], [c].[EndDate], [c].[Name], [c].[StartDate], [c].[Subject], [c].[TeacherId], [i].[CourseId], [i].[Score], [s].[Id], [s].[ApplicationUserId], [s].[Birthday], [s].[CodeMelly], [s].[FullName], [s].[Gender], [s].[Grade], [s].[PhoneNumber], [i].[StudentId]
FROM (
    SELECT SC.*,
                             S.Id AS Student_Id,
                             S.*,
                             C.Id AS Course_Id,
                             C.*,
                             T.Id AS Teacher_Id,
                             T.*
                             FROM StudentCourses AS SC , Teachers AS T
                             INNER JOIN Courses AS C ON SC.CourseId = C.Id
                             INNER JOIN Students AS S ON SC.StudentId = S.Id
) AS [i]
INNER JOIN [Courses] AS [c] ON [i].[CourseId] = [c].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Students] AS [s] ON [i].[StudentId] = [s].[Id]

SELECT [c].[Id], [c].[CourseFee], [c].[EndDate], [c].[Name], [c].[StartDate], [c].[Subject], [c].[TeacherId], [i].[CourseId], [i].[Score], [s].[Id], [s].[ApplicationUserId], [s].[Birthday], [s].[CodeMelly], [s].[FullName], [s].[Gender], [s].[Grade], [s].[PhoneNumber], [i].[StudentId]
FROM (
    SELECT SC.*,
                             S.Id AS Student_Id,
                             C.Id AS Course_Id,
                             T.Id AS Teacher_Id,
                             FROM StudentCourses AS SC , Teachers AS T
                             INNER JOIN Courses AS C ON SC.CourseId = C.Id
                             INNER JOIN Students AS S ON SC.StudentId = S.Id
) AS [i]
INNER JOIN [Courses] AS [c] ON [i].[CourseId] = [c].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Students] AS [s] ON [i].[StudentId] = [s].[Id]

SELECT [c].[Id], [c].[CourseFee], [c].[EndDate], [c].[Name], [c].[StartDate], [c].[Subject], [c].[TeacherId], [i].[CourseId], [i].[Score], [s].[Id], [s].[ApplicationUserId], [s].[Birthday], [s].[CodeMelly], [s].[FullName], [s].[Gender], [s].[Grade], [s].[PhoneNumber], [i].[StudentId]
FROM (
    SELECT SC.*,
                             S.Id AS Student_Id,
                             C.Id AS Course_Id,
                             T.Id AS Teacher_Id
                             FROM StudentCourses AS SC , Teachers AS T
                             INNER JOIN Courses AS C ON SC.CourseId = C.Id
                             INNER JOIN Students AS S ON SC.StudentId = S.Id
) AS [i]
